infotexts.resound_luauserdataerror: ReSound | Unable to start mod. Please enable "Enable CSharp Scripting" in "LuaCs Settings", located in the top-left corner of the main menu
infotexts.resound_reading_from_mod: ReSound | Reading sound overrides from mod "%s"...
infotexts.resound_reading_from_mod_failed: ReSound | Error while reading sound overrides in mod "%s": The JSON file is incorrectly formatted. Skipping...
infotexts.resound_find_original_sound_failed: ReSound | Error in mod "%s": The original sound "%s" does not exist. Skipping...
infotexts.resound_find_custom_sound_failed: ReSound | Error in mod "%s": The replacement sound "%s" does not exist. Skipping...
infotexts.resound_registered_group_add: ReSound | Registered sound addition "%s" to group "%s" with %d total sounds and a %.1f%% chance of playing
infotexts.resound_registered_group_sub: ReSound | Registered sound subtraction "%s" from group "%s". There are %d remaining "%s" sounds
infotexts.resound_find_group_failed_add: ReSound | Error in mod "%s": The sound group "%s" does not exist. The custom sound "%s" was not added. Skipping...
infotexts.resound_find_group_failed_sub: ReSound | Error in mod "%s": The sound group "%s" does not exist. The target sound "%s" was not removed. Skipping...
infotexts.resound_override_warning: ReSound | Load order alert: "%s" is replacing an already replaced sound "%s" with "%s"
infotexts.resound_registered_sound: ReSound | Registered sound replacement of "%s" with "%s"
infotexts.resound_reading_finished: ReSound | Finished reading: Checked %d compatible mods and successfully registered %d sound replacements, %d additions, and %d subtractions
infotexts.resound_reading_finished_failed: ReSound | Finished reading: Checked %d compatible mods but failed to register any sound replacements, additions, or subtractions
infotexts.resound_importantlogs_tooltip: Toggles useful messages in the console relating to loading errors in other mods
infotexts.resound_otherlogs_tooltip: Toggles more detailed messages in the console relating to registering sounds
infotexts.resound_enablepackage_tooltip: Toggles all changes from the mod "%s"
